attributes.action: INVESTIGATE OPCAPITA'S PROFITS OVER CLOSURE OF COMET AND LOSS OF OVER 6000 JOBS.
attributes.additional_details:
Government to investigate OpCapita's purchase of Comet for £2 and the loss of another British Retailer (MFI) at the hands of Henry Jackson. We are potentially losing 6722 jobs with redundancies being paid by THE BRITISH TAXPAYER.

Opcapita alledgedly took the £50Million Dowry given to them by Kesa and took another £50Million from the Warranty company which they sold,

WE WANT THE GOVERNMENT TO
1) Reform Solvency Laws

2) Review corporation tax laws to why American companies DO NOT PAY TAX yet comet has been for over 80 years.

3) Investigate Henry Jackson and OpCapita's Profitible gain over the closure of Comet.
